entries.title: Added Favorites Watchlist
entries.details: Save strategies to a local watchlist, track the count in the nav, and manage selections from the Favorites page.

entries.title: Added Dark Mode
entries.details: Toggle between light and dark themes. Preference saved to localStorage.

entries.title: Added Monthly Returns Heatmap
entries.details: Visual heatmap showing monthly returns by year on strategy detail pages.

entries.title: Added Drawdown Chart
entries.details: Peak-to-trough drawdown visualization on strategy detail pages.

entries.title: Enhanced Homepage with Multiple Leaderboards
entries.details: Added 4 strategy leaderboard charts: SPY 1Y, SPY 5Y, GLD 1Y, EURUSD 1Y.

entries.title: Added 10 New Strategies
entries.details: Risk Parity, Min Variance, HRP, Ichimoku, Adaptive MA, HMM Regime, Drawdown Control, BB-KC Squeeze, Turn of Month, Stochastic Reversion.

entries.title: Added KC-01 Keltner Channel Breakout
entries.details: ATR channel breakout with EMA midline.

entries.title: Added ADX-01 ADX Trend Filter
entries.details: Directional filter using ADX and DI thresholds.

entries.title: Added SUPER-01 Supertrend
entries.details: ATR-based trailing trend signal with band flips.

entries.title: Added SAR-01 Parabolic SAR
entries.details: Stop-and-reverse trend system with acceleration factor.

entries.title: Added HMA-01 HMA Crossover
entries.details: Fast/slow Hull MA crossover trend model.

entries.title: Added CS-01 Cross-Sectional Momentum
entries.details: Monthly cross-sectional ranking with volatility-scaled weights.

entries.title: Added CS-02 Low Volatility Rotation
entries.details: Monthly rotation into the lowest volatility assets.

entries.title: Added CARRY-01 FX Carry
entries.details: Carry proxy strategy with monthly rebalance and vol filter.

entries.title: Added STAT-01 SPY-GLD Pair
entries.details: Pairs trading strategy using spread z-score.

entries.title: Added RP-01 Volatility Target
entries.details: Volatility targeting overlay with leverage cap.

entries.title: Added SEAS-01 Monthly Seasonality
entries.details: Sell in May seasonal timing on SPY.

entries.title: Added EVENT-01 Trend + Macro Filter
entries.details: Trend strategy with macro event blackout window.

entries.title: Added TAIL-01 Crisis Alpha
entries.details: Defensive exposure triggered by volatility regimes.

entries.title: Added TURTLE-01 Turtle Trading
entries.details: Classic 20/10 breakout system with trailing exit logic.

entries.title: Added TREND-02 Donchian Breakout
entries.details: Introduced a 55/20 breakout model with ATR sizing and trend focus.

entries.title: Updated TREND-05 regime filter
entries.details: Improved the moving average model with volatility-aware exits.

entries.title: Added MR-01 RSI Mean Reversion
entries.details: Short-horizon mean reversion model tuned for daily bars.

entries.title: Added VOL-01 Volatility Breakout
entries.details: New strategy targeting volatility expansion in energy and FX.

entries.title: Added REG-01 Regime Switch
entries.details: Adaptive regime logic with long-term trend and volatility gating.

entries.title: Initial strategy library launch
entries.details: Released the first batch of trend and momentum strategies.
